name: Gridberd
description: The game GRIDBERD is an action horror game in the first person, in which you have to solve the terrible mystery of the ancestral Johnson Mansion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 3110 or AMD Phenom II X4 955 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon HD 5850 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S or AMD FX-8320 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or Radeon R9 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space

reviews.review_text: The intro is a bit long, we get too much information. Also the character is moving too slow, but it isn't a big problem. Great work anyways.
Very impressive stylish graphics create the atmosphere of fear and terror.

The game looks very good good from a graphical stand point. The story the developer is going for has a chance to be interesting unfortunately the way it is told in the game is very forced. Aside from the buggy and glitchy gameplay, the game is just over 1 hour long frm start to end. Would not recommend in its current stage.
This game is truely HORRIBLE do not buy it!!
